title: NIVEA Skin Firming and Toning Body Gel Cream with Q10, Firming Body Cream, Moisturizing Skin Cream, 6.7 Oz Tube
description: Say hello to firmer, more toned skin with NIVEA Skin Firming & Toning Gel Cream, enriched with Q10, L-Carnitine and Lotus Extract. This formula works to improve the skin’s firmness in a little as 2 weeks with regular use, and leaves skin feeling soft and supple. This smooth lightweight gel cream is fast-absorbing and also firms and tones the appearance of the skin with a non-greasy feel that is light to the touch. This body gel cream is dermatologically tested, and is an ideal addition to a daily skincare regimen. NIVEA is proud to be one of the leading companies in the field of skin care products, with more than 130 years of experience. To use, apply gel cream twice daily to thighs, buttocks and stomach.
